articles.title: Liz Weston: Does a spouse automatically inherit everything if their partner dies without a will? - OregonLive
articles.description: Oregon is not a community property state, and its rules will vary from other states
articles.content:
Dear Liz: Does a spouse automatically inherit everything if the other passes away without a will?
Answer: Not necessarily.
